entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Periods of snow beginning this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 3 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 3 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 4.
